title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8138.04 - Village of Hoosick Falls
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8138.04 - Village of Hoosick Falls

State Regulations
(a) River

Road. River Road between Route 22 and Mechanic Street. (b) Mechanic Street. Mechanic Street between

River Road and Liberty Avenue. (c) Liberty Avenue. Liberty Avenue between Mechanic Street and its westerly
terminus. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8138.04

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
